entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 9:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: ESE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
